com.rrbrussell.enigma_demonstration

Class Rotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rrbrussell.enigma_demonstration.Rotor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RotorI, RotorII, RotorIII, RotorIV, RotorV

    public class Rotor
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class used by all of the Enigma's rotors.

    This class is not usable by itself. The subclasses must be used because Java Enumerations cannot store arrays.

    Author:
    Robert R. Russell, robert@rrbrussell.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int Indicator
      Which position on the Indicator ring is visible.
      protected int IndicatorTransferPosition
      The position on the indicator ring when the rotor steps the next rotor in sequence and itself.
      static int RingSize
      Value for the Rotor.RingSize constraint.
      protected int Ringstellung
      Which position in the Wiring maps to 0 on the Indicator.
      protected int[] Wiring
      The internal wiring table.

    • Field Detail

      • Ringstellung

        protected int Ringstellung
        Which position in the Wiring maps to 0 on the Indicator.

      • Indicator

        protected int Indicator
        Which position on the Indicator ring is visible.

      • Wiring

        protected int[] Wiring
        The internal wiring table.

      • IndicatorTransferPosition

        protected int IndicatorTransferPosition
        The position on the indicator ring when the rotor steps the next rotor in sequence and itself.

      • RingSize

        public static final int RingSize
        Value for the Rotor.RingSize constraint.

        The constraint is all values mapping into or out of a rotor must be between 0 and Rotor.RingSize - 1.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rotor

        public Rotor(int Ringstellung)
        Parameters:
        Ringstellung - Which position in the Wiring maps to 0 on the Indicator.
        Throws:
        RingSizeException - Ringstellung must comply with Rotor.RingSize constraint.

    • Method Detail

      • Step

        public boolean Step()
        Moves the Rotor on the spindle.
        Returns:
        True if the Rotor instance has stepped past its turnover point.

      • Encipher

        public int Encipher(int input)
        Encipher the input value
        Parameters:
        input - Plaintext
        Returns:
        Ciphertext

      • SetGrundstellung

        public void SetGrundstellung(int Grundstellung)
        The Grundstellung is the Indicator position for starting encipherment. Calling this after encipherment has begun is undefined behavior.
        Parameters:
        Grundstellung - The new Indicator position.

      • SatisfiesRingConstraint

        public static boolean SatisfiesRingConstraint(int Number)
        Parameters:
        Number - The number to test.
        Returns:
        True if Number is between 0 and Rotor.RingSize - 1 inclusive.
